required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Observational Study of the Long-term Effect of Latanoprost in Normal Tension Glaucoma
clinical_study.official_title: Prospective, Observational Study to Investigate the Long-term Effect of Xalatan® on Intraocular Pressure (IOP) and on Maintenance of Visual Field in Patients With Normal Tension Glaucoma (NTG)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the long-term efficacy and safety of latanoprost monotherapy in patients with normal tension glaucoma (NTG) using a prospective, observational design. Visits were scheduled at 6-month intervals for 24 months. Intraocular pressure (IOP), optic nerve head findings, visual field status, and adverse events were recorded.

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Raw Intraocular Pressure (IOP) by Visit
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Month 6, Month 12, Month 18, Month 24, Last Visit
primary_outcome.description: Mean IOP values measured by applanation tonometry or noncontact method; valid range: 8-40 millimeters of mercury (mmHg). Only the IOP reading for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed. Last visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value of IOP.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With a 24-Hour Intraocular Pressure (IOP) Profile: Month 12
primary_outcome.description: Response: Yes = had an IOP 24-hour profile; No = did not have an IOP 24-hour profile.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With a 24-Hour Intraocular Pressure (IOP) Profile: Month 24
primary_outcome.description: Response: Yes = had an IOP 24-hour profile; No = did not have an IOP 24-hour profile.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants Per Visit With Intraocular Pressure (IOP) 24-Hour Pressure Peaks: Month 12
primary_outcome.description: Response: Yes = had IOP 24-hour pressure peak; No = did not have IOP 24-hour pressure peak.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants Per Visit With Intraocular Pressure (IOP) 24-Hour Pressure Peaks: Month 24
primary_outcome.description: Response: Yes = had IOP 24-hour pressure peak; No = did not have IOP 24-hour pressure peak.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved Intraocular Pressure (IOP) Target at Last Visit
primary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants who achieved their IOP target set at baseline. Response: Yes = achieved IOP target at last vist; No = did not achieve IOP target at last visit.

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline by Visit in Optic Disc Excavation: Horizontal Cup to Disc Ratio
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Month 6, Month 12, Month 18, Month 24, Last Visit
primary_outcome.description: Mean horizontal cup to disc (cup/disc or C/D) ratio measured by slit lamp examination to assess progression of glaucoma; calculated as the ratio of the diameter of the depression (cup) to that of the optical nerve head (disc). Valid range: 0.1-1.0. Only data for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed.

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline by Visit in Optic Disc Excavation: Vertical Cup to Disc Ratio
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Month 6, Month 12, Month 18, Month 24, Last Visit
primary_outcome.description: Mean vertical cup to disc (cup/disc or C/D) ratio measured by slit lamp examination to assess progression of glaucoma; calculated as the ratio of the diameter of the depression (cup) to that of the optical nerve head (disc). Valid range: 0.1-1.0; a high cup/disc ratio may imply glaucoma. Only data for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Optic Disc Hemorrhage by Visit: Month 6
primary_outcome.description: Presence of optic disc hemorrhages assessed by slip lamp examination. Only data for eye were treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Optic Disc Hemorrhage by Visit: Month 12
primary_outcome.description: Presence of optic disc hemorrhages assessed by slip lamp examination. Only data for eye were treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Optic Disc Hemorrhage by Visit: Month 18
primary_outcome.description: Presence of optic disc hemorrhages assessed by slip lamp examination. Only data for eye were treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Optic Disc Hemorrhage by Visit: Month 24
primary_outcome.description: Presence of optic disc hemorrhages assessed by slip lamp examination. Only data for eye were treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed.

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Heidelberg Retina Tomograph (HRT) Parameters: Rim Area
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Month 6, Month 12, Month 18, Month 24, Last Visit
primary_outcome.description: Rim area (millimeter [mm]2) right and left eye assessed by HRT imaging. Valid range: 0.500 to 1.900 mm2. Only the rim area for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed.

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Heidelberg Retina Tomograph (HRT) Parameters: Rim Volume
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Month 6, Month 12, Month 18, Month 24, Last Visit
primary_outcome.description: Rim volume (mm3) right and left eye assessed by HRT imaging. Valid range: 0.080 to 0.700 mm3. Only the rim volume for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed.

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Heidelberg Retina Tomograph Parameters: Cup Shape Measure
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Month 6, Month 12, Month 18, Month 24, Last Visit
primary_outcome.description: Cup shape measure right and left eye assessed by HRT imaging . Valid range: -0.400 to -0.010. Only the cup shape measure for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed.

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Heidelberg Retina Tomograph (HRT) Parameters: Mean RNFL Thickness
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Month 6, Month 12, Month 18, Month 24, Last Visit
primary_outcome.description: Mean retinal nerve fiber layer (RNFL) thickness in millimeters (mm) right and left eye assessed by HRT imaging. Valid range: 0.100 to 0.400 mm. Only the RNFL for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Change From Baseline to Month 24 in Aulhorn Stages
primary_outcome.description: Values of change in Aulhorn Stage measured by Humphrey Visual Field Analyzer. Aulhorn stages: no scotoma, Stage I (relative scotomas only), Stage II (absolute scotomas without connection to blind spot), Stage III (absolute scotomas with connection to blind spot), Stage IV (absolute scotomas more than 1 quadrant affected), and Stage V (temporal residual visual field only). If both eyes were treated with Xalantan® the value of right eye was analyzed; otherwise, only the assessment for the eye treated with study medication was used.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Change From Baseline to Month 24 in Visual Field Defect
primary_outcome.description: Change in mean defect right and left eye; valid range: -30 - + 30 decibels (dB). Visual field defect categories: preperimetric glaucoma: ≥ -2 dB; mild damage: < -2 dB and ≥ -3.3 dB; moderate damage: < -3.3 dB and ≥ -4.6 dB; and severe damage: < -4.6 dB. If both eyes were treated with Xalatan® , the value for the right eye was used; otherwise, only the mean defect value for the eye treated with study medication was used.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Investigator Assessments of Efficacy at Month 24
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with Investigator assessments of the efficacy of Xalatan® treatment rated as: 1=very good, 2=good, 3=moderate, 4=insufficient. If study medication was stopped before 24 months, assessment was performed at the time of early termination.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Individual Progression of Glaucoma Damage: Horizontal Cup to Disc Ratio and/or Vertical Cup to Disc Ratio
primary_outcome.description: Increase in Horizontal Cup to Disc Ratio and/or Vertical Cup to Disc Ratio by at least 0.2 (Last Visit minus Baseline).

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Individual Progression of Glaucoma Damage: Optic Disc Hemorrhage
primary_outcome.description: Participants with at least one post-baseline optic disc hemorrhage.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Individual Progression of Glaucoma Damage: Rim Area, Rim Volume, or Mean Retinal Nerve Fiber Layer (RNFL) Thickness
primary_outcome.description: Decrease in at least one Heidelberg Retina Tomograph (HRT) parameter by: Rim Area 0.2 millimeter (mm)2, Rim Volume 0.1 mm3, or mean retinal nerve fiber layer (RNFL) Thickness 0.1 mm, (Last Visit minus Baseline).

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Individual Progression of Glaucoma Damage: Visual Field Defect-Deterioration
primary_outcome.description: Visual Field Deterioration rated as progressive by physician on at least one post-baseline visit; range: 1= improved 2= stable 3= progressive. If both eyes were treated with Xalatan® the value for the right eye was used; otherwise, only the assessment for the eye treated with study medication was used.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Individual Progression of Glaucoma Damage: Aulhorn Stage
primary_outcome.description: Increase in Aulhorn Stage by at least one stage (last visit minus baseline). Three different visual field defect categories defined using Aulhorn stage values 1-5: Aulhorn stage 1 = mild damage, Aulhorn stages 2, 3 = moderate damage, Aulhorn stages 4, 5 =severe damage.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Individual Progression of Glaucoma Damage: Mean Defect
primary_outcome.description: Decrease in mean defect by at least 2.5 decibels (dB) (Last Visit minus Baseline).

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Overall Progression of Glaucoma Damage
primary_outcome.description: Overall progression defined as at least 1 of the 6 individual progression of glaucoma damage measures met: increase in horizontal cup to disc ratio and/or vertical cup to disc ratio by at least 0.2; at least 1 post Baseline (BL) optic-disc hemorrhage; decreased rim area (0.2 mm2), rim volume (0.1 mm3), mean retinal nerve fiber layer (RNFL)(0.1 mm), progressive visual field deterioration, increase in Aulhorn stage (by at least 1 stage), and/or decrease in mean defect by at least 2.5 decibels [dB])

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Progression of Optic Disc Excavation
primary_outcome.description: Progression (Last Visit minus Baseline) defined as increase in horizontal cup to disc ratio and/or vertical cup to disc ratio by at least 0.2, and/or decrease in at least 1 of Heidelberg Retina Tomograph (HRT) parameters (deterioration of rim area 0.2 mm2; deterioration of rim volume 0.1 mm3 deterioration or mean retinal nerve fiber layer (RNFL) thickness 0.1 mm).

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Progression of Visual Field
primary_outcome.description: Progression defined as visual field deterioration rated progressive by physician on at least 1 post-baseline visit, and increase in Aulhorn stage (by at least 1 stage) and/or decrease in mean defect by at least 2.5 dB (Last Visit minus Baseline).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
patients with normal-tension glaucoma
Exclusion Criteria:

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.

participant_flow.recruitment_details: In this prospective non-interventional study, participants did not actively participate in the study but were observed in general clinical practice by office-based ophthalmologists.

group.title: Xalatan®
group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

group.title: Xalatan®
group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

measure.title: Age, Customized
Gender, Customized
Raw Intraocular Pressure
measure.description: Mean IOP value measured by applanation tonometry or noncontact method; valid range: 8-40 millimeters of mercury (mmHg). Only the IOP reading for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed. Participants may represented in more than 1 category. Results based on participants in PP population with a non-missing response at baseline.

measure.title: Horizontal Cup to Disc Ratio
measure.description: Mean horizontal cup to disc ratio measured by slit lamp examination to assess progression of glaucoma; calculated as the ratio of the diameter of the depression (cup) to that of the optical nerve head (disc). Valid range: 0.1-1.0. Only data for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed. Participants may be represented in more than 1 category. Results based on participants in PP population with a non-missing response at baseline.

measure.title: Vertical Cup to Disc Ratio
measure.description: Mean vertical cup to disc ratio measured by slit lamp examination to assess progression of glaucoma; calculated as the ratio of the diameter of the depression (cup) to that of the optical nerve head (disc). Valid range: 0.1-1.0. Only data for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed. Participants may be represented in more than 1 category. Results based on participants in PP population with a non-missing response at baseline.

measure.title: Rim Area
measure.description: Rim area (millimeter [mm]2) right and left eye assessed by HRT imaging. Valid range: 0.500 to 1.900 mm2. Only the rim area for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed. Participants may represent more than 1 category. Results based on participants in PP population with a non-missing response at baseline.

measure.title: Rim Volume
measure.description: Rim volume (mm3) right and left eye assessed by HRT imaging. Valid range: 0.080 to 0.700 mm3. Only the rim volume for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed. Participants may be represented in more than 1 category. Results based on participants in PP population with a non-missing response at baseline.

measure.title: Cup Shape Measure
measure.description: Cup shape measure right and left eye assessed by HRT imaging. Valid range: -0.400 to -0.010. Only the cup shape measure for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed. Participants may be represented in more than 1 category. Results based on participants in PP population with a non-missing response at baseline.

measure.title: Retinal Nerve Fiber Layer Thickness
measure.description: Mean retinal nerve fiber layer (RNFL) thickness in millimeters (mm) right and left eye assessed by HRT imaging. Valid range: 0.100 to 0.400 mm. Only the RNFL for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed. Participants may be represented in more than 1 category. Results based on participants in PP population with a non-missing response at baseline.

measure.title: Optic Disc Hemorrhage
measure.description: Presence of optic disc hemorrhages assessed by slip lamp examination. Only data for eye were treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed. Participants may be represented in more than 1 category. Results based on participants in PP population with a non-missing response at baseline.

outcome.title: Change From Baseline in Raw Intraocular Pressure (IOP) by Visit
outcome.description: Mean IOP values measured by applanation tonometry or noncontact method; valid range: 8-40 millimeters of mercury (mmHg). Only the IOP reading for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed. Last visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value of IOP.
outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Month 6, Month 12, Month 18, Month 24, Last Visit
outcome.population: Per protocol (PP) analysis set: all participants in the Full Analysis Set (at least 1 dose of Xalatan® and 1 post-baseline IOP measurement) who were treated for ≥18 months; had at least BL and 1 post-BL non-missing efficacy assessments for IOP at least 18 months apart; without ametropy at BL; and without additional glaucoma medication during study.

group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

Only the IOP reading for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed. Last visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value of IOP.

outcome.population: PP; N = number of participants with analyzable data at observation. The total number of participants by visit with an IOP peak response of ‘Yes’ differs from those with numerical values of IOP peaks since 1 of the 2 fields was populated for certain participants.

outcome.title: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved Intraocular Pressure (IOP) Target at Last Visit
outcome.description: Percentage of participants who achieved their IOP target set at baseline. Response: Yes = achieved IOP target at last vist; No = did not achieve IOP target at last visit.
outcome.population: PP; n = number of subjects in the Per Protocol Analysis Set with a non-missing response at Last Visit. Last visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value of IOP.

group.title: Xalatan®
group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

measure.title: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved Intraocular Pressure (IOP) Target at Last Visit
measure.description: Percentage of participants who achieved their IOP target set at baseline. Response: Yes = achieved IOP target at last vist; No = did not achieve IOP target at last visit.
measure.population: PP; n = number of subjects in the Per Protocol Analysis Set with a non-missing response at Last Visit. Last visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value of IOP.

outcome.title: Change From Baseline by Visit in Optic Disc Excavation: Horizontal Cup to Disc Ratio
outcome.description: Mean horizontal cup to disc (cup/disc or C/D) ratio measured by slit lamp examination to assess progression of glaucoma; calculated as the ratio of the diameter of the depression (cup) to that of the optical nerve head (disc). Valid range: 0.1-1.0. Only data for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed.
outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Month 6, Month 12, Month 18, Month 24, Last Visit
outcome.population: PP; N = number of participants with horizontal cup to disc ratio data at baseline and at least 1 post-baseline visit; change analyzed for participants with a non-missing response at baseline and observation. Last Visit: change in participants with a non-missing response at both baseline and at least one post-baseline visit.

group.title: Xalatan®
group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

measure.title: Change From Baseline by Visit in Optic Disc Excavation: Horizontal Cup to Disc Ratio
measure.description: Mean horizontal cup to disc (cup/disc or C/D) ratio measured by slit lamp examination to assess progression of glaucoma; calculated as the ratio of the diameter of the depression (cup) to that of the optical nerve head (disc). Valid range: 0.1-1.0. Only data for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed.
measure.population: PP; N = number of participants with horizontal cup to disc ratio data at baseline and at least 1 post-baseline visit; change analyzed for participants with a non-missing response at baseline and observation. Last Visit: change in participants with a non-missing response at both baseline and at least one post-baseline visit.

outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Month 6, Month 12, Month 18, Month 24, Last Visit
outcome.population: PP. N = number of participants with vertical cup to disc ratio at baseline and at least 1 post-baseline visit; change analyzed for participants with a non-missing response at baseline and observation. Last Visit: change in vertical cup to disc ratio in participants with a non-missing response at both baseline and at least one post-baseline visit.

group.title: Xalatan®

measure.title: Change From Baseline by Visit in Optic Disc Excavation: Vertical Cup to Disc Ratio

Last Visit: change in vertical cup to disc ratio in participants with a non-missing response at both baseline and at least one post-baseline visit.

outcome.population: PP; N = number of participants who indicated whether or not they had an optic disc hemorrhage at the given visit.

outcome.title: Change From Baseline in Heidelberg Retina Tomograph (HRT) Parameters: Rim Area
outcome.description: Rim area (millimeter [mm]2) right and left eye assessed by HRT imaging. Valid range: 0.500 to 1.900 mm2. Only the rim area for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed.

outcome.population: PP; n = number of participants with a non-missing response at both visits (baseline and observation). Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for rim area.

measure.description: Rim volume (mm3) right and left eye assessed by HRT imaging. Valid range: 0.080 to 0.700 mm3. Only the rim volume for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed.
measure.population: PP; n = number of participants with a non-missing response at both visits (baseline and observation). Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for rim volume.

outcome.title: Change From Baseline in Heidelberg Retina Tomograph Parameters: Cup Shape Measure
outcome.description: Cup shape measure right and left eye assessed by HRT imaging . Valid range: -0.400 to -0.010. Only the cup shape measure for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed.
outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Month 6, Month 12, Month 18, Month 24, Last Visit
outcome.population: PP; n = number of participants with a non-missing response at both visits (baseline and observation). Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for cup shape measure.

group.title: Xalatan®
group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

measure.title: Change From Baseline in Heidelberg Retina Tomograph Parameters: Cup Shape Measure
measure.description: Cup shape measure right and left eye assessed by HRT imaging . Valid range: -0.400 to -0.010. Only the cup shape measure for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed.
measure.population: PP; n = number of participants with a non-missing response at both visits (baseline and observation). Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for cup shape measure.

outcome.title: Change From Baseline in Heidelberg Retina Tomograph (HRT) Parameters: Mean RNFL Thickness
outcome.description: Mean retinal nerve fiber layer (RNFL) thickness in millimeters (mm) right and left eye assessed by HRT imaging. Valid range: 0.100 to 0.400 mm. Only the RNFL for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed.
outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Month 6, Month 12, Month 18, Month 24, Last Visit
outcome.population: PP; n = number of participants with a non-missing response at both visits (baseline and observation). Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for RNFL thickness.

group.title: Xalatan®
group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

measure.title: Change From Baseline in Heidelberg Retina Tomograph (HRT) Parameters: Mean RNFL Thickness
measure.description: Mean retinal nerve fiber layer (RNFL) thickness in millimeters (mm) right and left eye assessed by HRT imaging. Valid range: 0.100 to 0.400 mm. Only the RNFL for the eye treated with Xalatan® was used; if both eyes were treated, the value of the right eye was analyzed.
measure.population: PP; n = number of participants with a non-missing response at both visits (baseline and observation). Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for RNFL thickness.

outcome.title: Number of Participants With Change From Baseline to Month 24 in Aulhorn Stages
outcome.description: Values of change in Aulhorn Stage measured by Humphrey Visual Field Analyzer. Aulhorn stages: no scotoma, Stage I (relative scotomas only), Stage II (absolute scotomas without connection to blind spot), Stage III (absolute scotomas with connection to blind spot), Stage IV (absolute scotomas more than 1 quadrant affected), and Stage V (temporal residual visual field only). If both eyes were treated with Xalantan® the value of right eye was analyzed; otherwise, only the assessment for the eye treated with study medication was used.
outcome.population: PP; N = number of participants who provided Aulhorn stage values of 1 to 5 at both baseline and month 24 visits.

group.title: Xalatan®
group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

measure.title: Number of Participants With Change From Baseline to Month 24 in Aulhorn Stages
measure.description: Values of change in Aulhorn Stage measured by Humphrey Visual Field Analyzer. Aulhorn stages: no scotoma, Stage I (relative scotomas only), Stage II (absolute scotomas without connection to blind spot), Stage III (absolute scotomas with connection to blind spot), Stage IV (absolute scotomas more than 1 quadrant affected), and Stage V (temporal residual visual field only). If both eyes were treated with Xalantan® the value of right eye was analyzed; otherwise, only the assessment for the eye treated with study medication was used.
measure.population: PP; N = number of participants who provided Aulhorn stage values of 1 to 5 at both baseline and month 24 visits.

outcome.title: Number of Participants With Change From Baseline to Month 24 in Visual Field Defect
outcome.description: Change in mean defect right and left eye; valid range: -30 - + 30 decibels (dB). Visual field defect categories: preperimetric glaucoma: ≥ -2 dB; mild damage: < -2 dB and ≥ -3.3 dB; moderate damage: < -3.3 dB and ≥ -4.6 dB; and severe damage: < -4.6 dB. If both eyes were treated with Xalatan® , the value for the right eye was used; otherwise, only the mean defect value for the eye treated with study medication was used.
outcome.population: PP; N = number of participants who provided a Mean Defect value at both Baseline and Month 24 visits.

group.title: Xalatan®
group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

measure.title: Number of Participants With Change From Baseline to Month 24 in Visual Field Defect
measure.description: Change in mean defect right and left eye; valid range: -30 - + 30 decibels (dB). Visual field defect categories: preperimetric glaucoma: ≥ -2 dB; mild damage: < -2 dB and ≥ -3.3 dB; moderate damage: < -3.3 dB and ≥ -4.6 dB; and severe damage: < -4.6 dB. If both eyes were treated with Xalatan® , the value for the right eye was used; otherwise, only the mean defect value for the eye treated with study medication was used.
measure.population: PP; N = number of participants who provided a Mean Defect value at both Baseline and Month 24 visits.

outcome.title: Number of Participants With Investigator Assessments of Efficacy at Month 24
outcome.description: Number of participants with Investigator assessments of the efficacy of Xalatan® treatment rated as: 1=very good, 2=good, 3=moderate, 4=insufficient. If study medication was stopped before 24 months, assessment was performed at the time of early termination.
outcome.population: PP; N = number of participants with a non-missing response at Month 24 visit.

group.title: Xalatan®
group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

measure.title: Number of Participants With Investigator Assessments of Efficacy at Month 24
measure.description: Number of participants with Investigator assessments of the efficacy of Xalatan® treatment rated as: 1=very good, 2=good, 3=moderate, 4=insufficient. If study medication was stopped before 24 months, assessment was performed at the time of early termination.
measure.population: PP; N = number of participants with a non-missing response at Month 24 visit.

outcome.title: Number of Participants With Individual Progression of Glaucoma Damage: Horizontal Cup to Disc Ratio and/or Vertical Cup to Disc Ratio
outcome.description: Increase in Horizontal Cup to Disc Ratio and/or Vertical Cup to Disc Ratio by at least 0.2 (Last Visit minus Baseline).
outcome.population: PP; results based on participants with both a Baseline and at least one post-baseline visit. Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for the relevant outcome measure.

group.title: Xalatan®
group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

measure.title: Number of Participants With Individual Progression of Glaucoma Damage: Horizontal Cup to Disc Ratio and/or Vertical Cup to Disc Ratio
measure.description: Increase in Horizontal Cup to Disc Ratio and/or Vertical Cup to Disc Ratio by at least 0.2 (Last Visit minus Baseline).
measure.population: PP; results based on participants with both a Baseline and at least one post-baseline visit. Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for the relevant outcome measure.

outcome.title: Number of Participants With Individual Progression of Glaucoma Damage: Optic Disc Hemorrhage
outcome.description: Participants with at least one post-baseline optic disc hemorrhage.
outcome.population: PP; results based on participants with at least one post-baseline assessment of optic disc hemorrhage. Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for the relevant outcome measure.

group.title: Xalatan®
group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

measure.title: Number of Participants With Individual Progression of Glaucoma Damage: Optic Disc Hemorrhage
measure.description: Participants with at least one post-baseline optic disc hemorrhage.
measure.population: PP; results based on participants with at least one post-baseline assessment of optic disc hemorrhage. Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for the relevant outcome measure.

outcome.title: Number of Participants With Individual Progression of Glaucoma Damage: Rim Area, Rim Volume, or Mean Retinal Nerve Fiber Layer (RNFL) Thickness
outcome.description: Decrease in at least one Heidelberg Retina Tomograph (HRT) parameter by: Rim Area 0.2 millimeter (mm)2, Rim Volume 0.1 mm3, or mean retinal nerve fiber layer (RNFL) Thickness 0.1 mm, (Last Visit minus Baseline).
outcome.population: PP; results based on participants with a value of the variable in question at both Baseline and at least one post-baseline visit. Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for the relevant outcome measure.

group.title: Xalatan®
group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

measure.title: Number of Participants With Individual Progression of Glaucoma Damage: Rim Area, Rim Volume, or Mean Retinal Nerve Fiber Layer (RNFL) Thickness
measure.description: Decrease in at least one Heidelberg Retina Tomograph (HRT) parameter by: Rim Area 0.2 millimeter (mm)2, Rim Volume 0.1 mm3, or mean retinal nerve fiber layer (RNFL) Thickness 0.1 mm, (Last Visit minus Baseline).
measure.population: PP; results based on participants with a value of the variable in question at both Baseline and at least one post-baseline visit. Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for the relevant outcome measure.

outcome.title: Number of Participants With Individual Progression of Glaucoma Damage: Visual Field Defect-Deterioration
outcome.description: Visual Field Deterioration rated as progressive by physician on at least one post-baseline visit; range: 1= improved 2= stable 3= progressive. If both eyes were treated with Xalatan® the value for the right eye was used; otherwise, only the assessment for the eye treated with study medication was used.
outcome.population: PP; results based on participants with at least one post-baseline assessment of change in visual field defect. Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for the relevant outcome measure.

group.title: Xalatan®
group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

measure.title: Number of Participants With Individual Progression of Glaucoma Damage: Visual Field Defect-Deterioration
measure.description: Visual Field Deterioration rated as progressive by physician on at least one post-baseline visit; range: 1= improved 2= stable 3= progressive. If both eyes were treated with Xalatan® the value for the right eye was used; otherwise, only the assessment for the eye treated with study medication was used.
measure.population: PP; results based on participants with at least one post-baseline assessment of change in visual field defect. Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for the relevant outcome measure.

outcome.title: Number of Participants With Individual Progression of Glaucoma Damage: Aulhorn Stage
outcome.description: Increase in Aulhorn Stage by at least one stage (last visit minus baseline). Three different visual field defect categories defined using Aulhorn stage values 1-5: Aulhorn stage 1 = mild damage, Aulhorn stages 2, 3 = moderate damage, Aulhorn stages 4, 5 =severe damage.
outcome.population: PP; results based on participants with a value for Aulhorn Stage at both Baseline and at least one post-baseline visit. Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for the relevant outcome measure.

group.title: Xalatan®
group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

measure.title: Number of Participants With Individual Progression of Glaucoma Damage: Aulhorn Stage
measure.description: Increase in Aulhorn Stage by at least one stage (last visit minus baseline). Three different visual field defect categories defined using Aulhorn stage values 1-5: Aulhorn stage 1 = mild damage, Aulhorn stages 2, 3 = moderate damage, Aulhorn stages 4, 5 =severe damage.
measure.population: PP; results based on participants with a value for Aulhorn Stage at both Baseline and at least one post-baseline visit. Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for the relevant outcome measure.

outcome.title: Number of Participants With Individual Progression of Glaucoma Damage: Mean Defect
outcome.description: Decrease in mean defect by at least 2.5 decibels (dB) (Last Visit minus Baseline).
outcome.population: PP; results based on participants with a value for mean defect at both Baseline and at least one post-baseline visit. Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for the relevant outcome measure.

group.title: Xalatan®
group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

measure.title: Number of Participants With Individual Progression of Glaucoma Damage: Mean Defect
measure.description: Decrease in mean defect by at least 2.5 decibels (dB) (Last Visit minus Baseline).
measure.population: PP; results based on participants with a value for mean defect at both Baseline and at least one post-baseline visit. Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for the relevant outcome measure.

outcome.title: Percentage of Participants With Overall Progression of Glaucoma Damage
outcome.description: Overall progression defined as at least 1 of the 6 individual progression of glaucoma damage measures met: increase in horizontal cup to disc ratio and/or vertical cup to disc ratio by at least 0.2; at least 1 post Baseline (BL) optic-disc hemorrhage; decreased rim area (0.2 mm2), rim volume (0.1 mm3), mean retinal nerve fiber layer (RNFL)(0.1 mm), progressive visual field deterioration, increase in Aulhorn stage (by at least 1 stage), and/or decrease in mean defect by at least 2.5 decibels [dB])
outcome.population: PP; to be included in the percentage, participants must have provided a response for at least one of the six individual progression of glaucoma damage measures. Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for the relevant outcome measure.

group.title: Xalatan®
group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

measure.title: Percentage of Participants With Overall Progression of Glaucoma Damage
measure.description: Overall progression defined as at least 1 of the 6 individual progression of glaucoma damage measures met: increase in horizontal cup to disc ratio and/or vertical cup to disc ratio by at least 0.2; at least 1 post Baseline (BL) optic-disc hemorrhage; decreased rim area (0.2 mm2), rim volume (0.1 mm3), mean retinal nerve fiber layer (RNFL)(0.1 mm), progressive visual field deterioration, increase in Aulhorn stage (by at least 1 stage), and/or decrease in mean defect by at least 2.5 decibels [dB])
measure.population: PP; to be included in the percentage, participants must have provided a response for at least one of the six individual progression of glaucoma damage measures. Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for the relevant outcome measure.

outcome.title: Percentage of Participants With Progression of Optic Disc Excavation
outcome.description: Progression (Last Visit minus Baseline) defined as increase in horizontal cup to disc ratio and/or vertical cup to disc ratio by at least 0.2, and/or decrease in at least 1 of Heidelberg Retina Tomograph (HRT) parameters (deterioration of rim area 0.2 mm2; deterioration of rim volume 0.1 mm3 deterioration or mean retinal nerve fiber layer (RNFL) thickness 0.1 mm).
outcome.population: PP; to be included in the percentage, participants must have provided a response for at least one of following events: increase in horizontal or vertical cup to disc ratio, or decrease in rim area, rim volume, or mean RNFL thickness. Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for the relevant outcome measure.

group.title: Xalatan®
group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

measure.title: Percentage of Participants With Progression of Optic Disc Excavation
measure.description: Progression (Last Visit minus Baseline) defined as increase in horizontal cup to disc ratio and/or vertical cup to disc ratio by at least 0.2, and/or decrease in at least 1 of Heidelberg Retina Tomograph (HRT) parameters (deterioration of rim area 0.2 mm2; deterioration of rim volume 0.1 mm3 deterioration or mean retinal nerve fiber layer (RNFL) thickness 0.1 mm).
measure.population: PP; to be included in the percentage, participants must have provided a response for at least one of following events: increase in horizontal or vertical cup to disc ratio, or decrease in rim area, rim volume, or mean RNFL thickness. Last Visit = last post-baseline visit at which participant provides a value for the relevant outcome measure.

outcome.title: Percentage of Participants With Progression of Visual Field
outcome.description: Progression defined as visual field deterioration rated progressive by physician on at least 1 post-baseline visit, and increase in Aulhorn stage (by at least 1 stage) and/or decrease in mean defect by at least 2.5 dB (Last Visit minus Baseline).
outcome.population: PP; to be included in the percentage, participants must have had Visual Field Deterioration rated as progressive by the physician on at least 1 post-baseline visit, and at least one measure of increase in Aulhorn Stage by at least 1 stage, and decrease in Mean Defect by at least 2 dB (last visit minus baseline).

group.title: Xalatan®
group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

measure.title: Percentage of Participants With Progression of Visual Field
measure.description: Progression defined as visual field deterioration rated progressive by physician on at least 1 post-baseline visit, and increase in Aulhorn stage (by at least 1 stage) and/or decrease in mean defect by at least 2.5 dB (Last Visit minus Baseline).
measure.population: PP; to be included in the percentage, participants must have had Visual Field Deterioration rated as progressive by the physician on at least 1 post-baseline visit, and at least one measure of increase in Aulhorn Stage by at least 1 stage, and decrease in Mean Defect by at least 2 dB (last visit minus baseline).

reported_events.desc: Safety population: all subjects who received at least 1 dose of study medication. An Adverse Event (AE) term may be reported as both a serious and non-serious AE, but are distinct events. AE may = serious for 1 subject and = non-serious for another subject or subject may have experienced both a serious and non-serious episode of the same event.

group.title: Xalatan®
group.description: Once daily as 1 drop (topical application) in the evening

category.title: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Pfizer has the right to review disclosures, requesting a delay of less than 60 days. Investigator will postpone single center publications until after disclosure of pooled data (all sites), less than 12 months from study completion/termination at all participating sites. Investigator may not disclose previously undisclosed confidential information other than study results.

clinical_results.limitations_and_caveats: Outcome measures for this observational non-interventional study were not designated as primary or secondary measures.
